name: My Sweet Smoothie
description:
This game was made in 5 days for educational purpose. Theme was hypercasual. Inspiration was game "Juicy Slicer".

Programmer: Ivan Ivkovic

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski

Gameplay

Tap on screen to launch weapon and slice fruits. You are limited to 5 times to the next spawn. There are infinite levels.

Features

If you gain enough coins you can buy different weapons in the shop. Also, you can upload your score in internet database if you want.

Please enjoy!
